A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Such a disappointment. A few good sections\, a pleasing scene between luke and Leia\, and that's about it. The rest was a forced\, patchy\, overly cheesy mess\, that in my opinion has wasted great characters and wiped out everything great about the originals. When I was a kid I wanted to be Luke Skywalker\, would any kid now really want to be Rey or the extremely sensitive/emotional wreck Finn?! \nStill can't quite believe how poor it was.
